metadata.description: Deposition of Dr. Vello Norman, Vice President of Research and Development at Lorillard Tobacco Company, testifying in the People of the State of California, et al. v. Philip Morris Incorporated, et al. Dr. Vello Norman answers questions about ventilation holes in Lorillard cigarettes, filter composition, and reconstituted tobacco. Tape #2.
metadata.subject: tobacco; cigarette;tobacco leaf ; cigarette smoke; laboratory research; nicotine; tar; low yield cigarette ; addiction ; tobacco industry scientist; filter; cigarette ventilation hole; cigarette ingredient;Browse by keywords in UCSF industry videos
metadata.title: [Deposition of Dr. Vello Norman, Day 1, Tape #2]; ARCHIVE LOCATION VARIANCE SHEET
